entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:41 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:35 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:35 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with wet snow early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:35 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
